turn them over a minute or two on the

when you stick it in the middle of the
thickest part but with these salmon
because pieces of salmon you do want to
be kind of on the rare side you want to

when you get to the center point but you

and that will tell you that it's some
you know I'll tell you what its firm as
you can see not raw but it's not

it's better to under cook a little bit
than overcook because you can always put
something back but but salmon king
salmon especially which this is very
fatty so it's kind of forgiving as long

you wind up with this fish that's really
